dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9486 IH: To extend the authority to reimburse members for spouse relicensing costs pursuant to a permanent change of station.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cartwright introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To extend the authority to reimburse members for spouse relicensing costs pursuant to a permanent change of station.

section.header: Extension of authority to reimburse members for spouse relicensing costs pursuant to a permanent change of station
section.text: Section 453(g)(3) of title 37, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2024 and inserting December 31, 2029.
